section.heading: Advance payment of costs and fees.
section.text: Costs and fees for services rendered by the Register of Wills and chargeable to others than the United States or the District of Columbia are payable in advance and shall be collected pursuant to such rules and regulations, not incompatible with law, as are prescribed by the court.

annotations.annotation: Costs in suits against Board of Education, see §§ 1-204.95, 38-101.
